scriptmanager.objects

Class PileupParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • scriptmanager.objects.PileupParameters

  • public class PileupParameters
extends java.lang.Object
    Object for storing pileup-related parameter information and constants.
    Author:
    William KM Lai
    See Also:
    TagPileup, PileupExtract, TagPileupCLI, TagPileupWindow

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      Read Type value encoding all reads

      Output matrix type value encoding cdt-formatted matrix output

      Read Aspect value encoding 5 prime end

      Read Aspect value encoding = full fragment

        get whether to gzip matrix output or not
        Returns:
        true means to gzip, false means flat text

        Parameters:

      • setAspect

        set stored parameter value for read aspect (5' end, 3' end, midpoint, or full fragment)
        Parameters:
        aSPECT - the read aspect encoding

      • getRead

        public int getRead()
        get stored parameter value for read type. Can be one of: PileupParameters.READ1, PileupParameters.READ2, or PileupParameters.ALLREADS
        Returns:
        the stored read type encoding

      • setRead

        public void setRead(int rEAD)
        set stored parameter value for read type. Can be one of: PileupParameters.READ1, PileupParameters.READ2, or PileupParameters.ALLREADS
        Parameters:
        rEAD - the read type encoding

      • getStrand

        public int getStrand()
        get stored parameter value for strandedness. Can be one of: PileupParameters.SEPARATE or PileupParameters.COMBINED
        Returns:
        the strand encoding

      • setStrand

        public void setStrand(int sTRAND)
        set stored parameter value for strandedness. Can be one of: PileupParameters.SEPARATE or PileupParameters.COMBINED
        Parameters:
        sTRAND - the stored strand encoding

      • getTrans

        public int getTrans()
        get stored parameter value for smoothing transformation of composite. Can be one of: PileupParameters.NO_SMOOTH, PileupParameters.WINDOW, or PileupParameters.GAUSSIAN
        Returns:
        the transformation type encoding

      • setTrans

        public void setTrans(int tRANS)
        set stored parameter value for smoothing transformation of composite. Can be one of: PileupParameters.NO_SMOOTH, PileupParameters.WINDOW, or PileupParameters.GAUSSIAN
        Parameters:
        tRANS - the stored transformation type encoding

      • getShift

        public int getShift()
        get the bp shift direction and distance for a read alignment. For TagPileup, upstream(+) and downstream(-)...note this is different from the ShiftInterval tool's upstream(-) and downstream(+)
        Returns:
        the stored bp shift distance

      • setShift

        public void setShift(int sHIFT)
        set the bp shift direction and distance for a read alignment. For TagPileup, upstream(+) and downstream(-)...note this is different from the ShiftInterval tool's upstream(-) and downstream(+)
        Parameters:
        sHIFT - the bp shift distance

      • getBin

        public int getBin()
        get the bin size in bp
        Returns:
        the stored bin size (bp)

      • setBin

        public void setBin(int bIN)
        set the bin size in bp
        Parameters:
        bIN - the bin size (bp)

      • getTagExtend

        public int getTagExtend()
        get the distance to extend the tag by
        Returns:
        distance (bp)

      • setTagExtend

        public void setTagExtend(int tAGEXTEND)
        set the distance to extend the tag by
        Parameters:
        tAGEXTEND - distance (bp)

      • getSmooth

        public int getSmooth()
        get the smoothing window size. Used when transformation is set to sliding window mode (PileupParameters.WINDOW)
        Returns:
        window size (bins)

      • setSmooth

        public void setSmooth(int sMOOTH)
        set the smoothing window size. Used when transformation is set to sliding window mode (PileupParameters.WINDOW)
        Parameters:
        sMOOTH - window size (bins)

      • getStdSize

        public int getStdSize()
        get standard deviation size for smoothing. Used when transformation is set to gaussian mode (PileupParameters.GAUSSIAN)
        Returns:
        standard deviations size (bins)

      • setStdSize

        public void setStdSize(int sTDSIZE)
        set standard deviation size for smoothing. Used when transformation is set to gaussian mode (PileupParameters.GAUSSIAN)
        Parameters:
        sTDSIZE - standard deviations size (bins)

      • getStdNum

        public int getStdNum()
        get number of standard deviations for smoothing. Used when transformation is set to gaussian mode (PileupParameters.GAUSSIAN)
        Returns:
        number of standard deviations (bins)s

      • setStdNum

        public void setStdNum(int sTDNUM)
        set number of standard deviations for smoothing. Used when transformation is set to gaussian mode (PileupParameters.GAUSSIAN)
        Parameters:
        sTDNUM - number of standard deviations (bins)
